ygData.subject: Re: From Casters Realm...
ygData.msgSnippet: They also say feign death isn t nerfed.... Anyways, I still won t believe it til I see it and I ve killed dozens of scorns. I heard PoF armor is pretty bad as
ygData.messageBody:
They also say feign death isn't nerfed....
Anyways, I still won't believe it til I see it and I've killed dozens of
scorns. I heard PoF armor is pretty bad as far as drop. A guild on my server
cleared the entire zone and got maybe 9 pieces of mixed armor, none of it
being Valorium or Ranger armor. Mostly druid.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan

>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

>Subject: [eqbards] From Casters Realm...

>
>BARDIC PLANE ARMOR
>I just double checked with the dev team to try and resolve this and have
>been informed they have extensively tested this and the Bard armor is
>dropping on public servers.
>
>Guess it's just ultra rare. At least Maestro always has a prsent for them.
